startpage.profile: My name is Daniel Dörbaum, 24 years old and junior frontend webdeveloper. Here you will learn more about me - wich skills I posess, on wich projects I work und how you can contact me.

personalInfo.title: About me
personalInfo.personalText:
In 2015, after graduating from secondary school, I started my professional career. Since I completed my apprenticeship as a technical model maker in gauge construction in 2019, I have been working in the automotive industry. Mainly in quality assurance.

But why would I switch from handicraft to software development?

Before I started my apprenticeship, I was already dealing with computer technology on a daily basis. I‘m very interested and in my free time I am still fascinated by the endless possibilities of software development. In 2022 I finally started the below-mentioned retraining as a frontend web developer.
personalInfo.translate2022: Begin with the retraining to a Frontend Webdeveloper.
